name: Fly Together
description:
Fly together is a short story hack and slash made for the Secret Santa Jam.

 Play as a young bluejay trying to survive in a hostile and somehow magical forest. Fight your way through the forest, gather friends, and find a way to escape the never ending forest.

Controls:

ArrowKeys: Move

Space: Jump

A : Dash Attack

S : Teleport Attack

D: Assist Call (Different for each direction input)

You can also change your controls in the main menu under "Controller Configuration". You can also choose to play on a controller from there as well.

Music and Sounds from: https://mixkit.co/
